reviews.review: Başlarda oynayamadığım için hiç sevmediğim ama gün geçtikçe bağımlısı olduğum oyun. Oynayın oynattırın

[i]weird analogy:[/i]
Dead by daylight is like a building, it has this big, pretty, appealing infrastructure but the foundation is critically flawed. Its only once you get to the top floors that you start to realize the building is swaying.

[i]my anger:[/i]
Cutting to the chase. First, the core survivor goals of the game need to be COMPLETELY overhauled. At high ranks killers are gen-rushed with little to nothing they can do about it because each survivor on their own is so strong due to loops, SWF, and the 5 million second chances they are given via perks. Holding M1 for 80 seconds straight isn't fun at all for survivors so increasing gen time any more then it already is would be ludicrous. But in its current state, gen speed is completely unfair, forcing killers to use perks they might not want to use just to give them a chance. From what I can tell a rework for the games foundation is NEVER going to happen because the survivor community has become so entitled to being able to almost 1 v 1 a killer that nerfing survivors into well, SURVIVORS would be met with catastrophic backlash. So if the game is going to keep the survivors as strong as they are the killer NEEDS more time/ways to hinder survivor progress. 80 seconds for 1 survivor on a gen (less if there's multiple which there usually is) is way too quick. I recommend adding other required objectives for survivors. Second, the devs have absolutely no idea how to balance a multiplayer video game. They seem to balance the game based on low-mid ranks? Causing high ranks to be absolutely broken like I mentioned above. Killers they deem "balanced" are completely useless at high ranks and perks they introduce as "balanced" are completely useless or brokenly good at high ranks. You balance a multiplayer video game based on the HIGHEST skill level, this creates a trickle-down effect that ensures the game at all ranks is fair. But Behavior doesn't grasp this concept. Third, the devs care more about pushing the next big bi-monthly cash grab rather then to fix the game. Each DLC release takes 1 step forwards and 10 steps back. Usually breaking things in the game that will stay broken for months to years. The most recent DLC, "A binding of kin" was admittedly by the devs NOT. FINISHED. And they released it anyways because they know this lovely, toxic, nearly brainwashed community will accept anything in the end. It doesn't matter how many people complain about the DLC, months after the release, the DLC will have nearly tens of thousands of downloads and Behavior will have made bank. I could go into all of the gameplay mechanics like looping, keys, moris, perks etc. but I wont because those topics have already been discussed to death.

Toxic community, and terrible devs. The forum moderator is a direct descendant of Adolph Hitler. Say anything that rubs him/her/it the wrong way and you are perma banned: no more screenshot uploads to your page or anything. 

The game itself is frustrating and unfun. Play survivor and you get mowed down by faster, better equipped killers. Play killer and you'll either slaughter them easily or play against teams called swf (survivor with friends) and they'll be on Discord and will harass you and make the game quite unenjoyable. And they'll cuss at you in the post game chat regardless of whether you played well or not. It's a toxic game in general.

Lot's of bugs and glitches that devs don't seem to care about. You'll get hooked on the game the way a battered housewife is hooked on her abuser; you keep thinking it'll get better. It doesn't.

This game is dying, killers have been buffed beyond all comprehension. They couldve made the mori's more visually pleasing. overall it feels like a PS2 game and has the mechanics of a pacman game. Youd actually be better off playing pacman and spending less money. UPDATE: the games even worse now... would not reccomend at all

初心者キラーと上級サバイバーがマッチングする所謂ガバマッチ状態ばかりではなく、一向に修正されないバグがありお金を払ってするゲームではない 。

VCパーティによりゲームバランスが崩壊しており、だれもキラー側をやろうとせず、サバイバー側のマッチング時間が長くなっている。また、サバイバーの民度が低く、ガバマッチで格下を相手にして煽って来たりするゲームです。

本作のゲームディレクター　マシュー・コート氏は下記の様な発言をしており、運営に対して全く信頼感がありません。
〇今キラーをプレイしたくない場合は、civilizationをプレイしてください。
〇忍耐強くあってほしいと思います。サバイバーを殺すことを目的とせず、楽しむことを目
　的としてほしい。
　相手に負けないことに執着しすぎると、楽しめなくなる。自分はウロウロするぐらいの気
　持ちで楽しんでいる。毎回できるストーリーを楽しんでほしい

それでも他に類を見ないゲームですので、一度やってみてほしいというのが本音です。
現状はオススメできませんが、運営のやり方次第ではオススメできるゲームになりえる可能性があるゲームです。
好游戏是好游戏，建议开加速器打外服，国服毛病多
lo juego desde XBOX y la experiencia y jugabilidad es la misma, la verdad es un muy buen juego.

The game is exciting and keeps me on my toes. Playing survivors is an adventure, and while it can take some time to que in for games if you arent with a group, it is worth the wait. I really do enjoy playing as the killer as well. It is exciting, and a nice break from worrying about team mates!
 Even if you don't yet have many of the DLC's, there is still a lot to choose from!

A part of me does like this game because of the concept of being a classic horror movie killer and the contrary of trying to escape the killer. But, while the game is very fun to play with friends casually, the game quickly shoots itself in the foot when playing with random people online. The game isn't scary, situations that would normally be scary, like being chased by the killer, turn into annoying games of ring around the rosy. The game ditches its cool concept as it poorly supports a more serious competitive tone. I believe that this game is a confusing mesh of competitive and horror that sadly, gives a below average experience in both areas.

Now that I am at 700 hours, I thought I'd amend my review <3

A thrilling game, 100%! Being able to play the bad guy adds a very unique feel to this game! BE the dark boss monster killing the party! Hunt your prey and relish the satisfaction in their screams! Every killer feels different from each other!  If you have a 'dom' personality, you will LOVE playing killer!! 

On the flip side, something about this game tilts people so if you are easily tilted by games I don't recommend taking it too seriously. I have no idea what but for some reason certain people get really mad playing.

I for one- and like literally the only one, find this game relaxing. Even the killer role.

But honestly, even though people meme it up, the community isn't really that bad comparatively.  Performance also is not near as bad as people exaggerate, at least in personal experience. GRANTED I am using a very powerful gaming laptop.

 Honestly the worst thing about the community is their pessimism *about* the community. On forums, comment sections and the like you see people saying how so many players are toxic but when you are actually in-game there is almost no toxic chat or behavior.

GRANTED this pov comes from an adult, I am significantly older and more patient than most of the player base.

Now that I have 1k hours played (all this year) I thought I would do a review.  
Very high learning curve (but still fun to learn)
Tons of depth and replay
Very skill based, no pay to win
Great events
Continuing to support and add characters
Recently added cross play with consoles

All in all you would think it would get repetitive but each match is different.  The only thing that needs improvement is the match making us off at times, but it does add challenge and make you better when matched against heir tier players.

Eu sinceramente gosto muito desse jogo, principalmente para jogar com os amigos. Contudo, é muito pesado e são requeridas atualizações frequentemente, o que desanima muito.

Playing with friends makes this game much easier as survivors. Game very by how skill the killer is and the survivors play styles. Some match are luck base depending as an example is where as the chest can spawn purple or red key for the survivors to two survivors spawning next to the killer. As new player you have to get self care to make some of the matches more easy. For self care you have to level up the blood web 40 from the black girl with that ability. For the killer is learning a killer ability and what it does and what your best add on are. The killer perk that you want is whisper to help you find survivors faster.

Dead By Daylight has nothing peaceful. Okay, we meant that the commands are easy. And they are. The game can be enjoyed by users of any level, mainly because it does not have direct combat. It is knowing how to move, run and interact with the scenarios
The game is extremely tense. At all times you will feel chased by the killer within the scenarios, even more because of the third person view for the survivors
Dead By Daylight still impresses whether in the shoes of the killer or the survivors, it remains as much fun as before. The game makes a great effort to be varied, with randomly generated scenarios, and a lot of customizable content. However, there are still small visual bugs and, in general, it is much more fun only when we play with a known group of people, a game just perfect for those who like tension and teamwork

It is one of the best games I've played
Rly recommend

This game is by far the best I have every played. While it does have some bugs here and there, it always gets me logging on the next day. Some of the pros are dynamic and rewarding gameplay. A con is servers can be unstable an can lead to lag. The diversity of the killers and survivors is very compelling, leading me to spend more time and money. A note for new players, buy dlcs when they are on sale because they are a really good deal and come on often. While this game is very very rewarding, it is hard to get into. When I started I felt de-motivated to grind my characters up because of the massive learning curve. I recommend to anyone new to know that there is a light at the end of the tunnel, and keep playing Dead By Daylight!! * Watch Otzdarva on Youtube and Twitch if you want to learn, he is a great content creator that really teaches you about the game *

i liked this game from the first time i heard about the game and when i first got to see the game as it was played by a friend of mine... and i have been trying to find a way to play the game and i finally have a way to play and enjoy the game as i am a horror fan in general... the part to the game i do not like is being trolled and frammed that makes it unfair

Game can be a lot of fun when you get down under rank 15. Best played with survive with friends. downsides are that the community can be really toxic and killers will camp you on the hook or tunnel you to get the kill over and over and new survivors will fall for it and pull you off the hook  just so you can get downed again. Best to just do generators to put pressure on the killer. 

Overall fun if you put time into it. Ives played it off and on for 3 years on consoles and PC. Just try to get to rank 4 or better and life will get (somewhat) better for you in the game.
